duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate documentation prior to the start of the installation and training for the Property Management System.
Maintain a strong customer relationship with the franchisee throughout the entire deployment process to ensure a high level of customer satisfaction.
Complete PM system installation & training for any assigned properties.
Capable of presenting the details of the PM system clearly and concisely. Comfortable with public speaking.
Able to assist in answering questions and providing vital updates when necessary.
Understanding of IT, training, and Property Management Systems.
Ability to work well under pressure.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Training, or Property Management (Certification in PM Systems Preferred)
